EmailTemplate.description: To be used as a final response to customers who inquire about an ongoing outage.
EmailTemplate.name: Outage Resolution Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Outage Resolution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are pleased to inform you that the intermitent system availability with <Product Name> is resolved and you should be able to access the services as before.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care Support Portal
